review: I bought this device basically to cast Netflix movies to my TV.  The picture is casted very nicely and clearly but the sound is not.  The music part of the movie is way louder than the conversation and I have to adjust the sound continuously as I am watching a movie.  I tried the sound options of my TV including "clear voice"  but have the same problem.  I also tried to cast the videos I have in my laptop but the picture, however clear, moves as slow motion and not continuously!  I hope that Google makes some improvements when this software part of the device is no longer a "beta"
author: Jammy
